snippet: Mr. Putin’s reported tactics in Crimea are sure to backfire.
abstract: Editorial holds that Russian Pres Vladimir Putin has been outrageously provocative in response to crisis in Ukraine, organizing war games near border and giving ousted Pres Viktor Yanukovych safe harbor; supports Pres Obama in his warning against any Russian military intervention, and calls upon Russia and the West to cooperate peacefully to stabilize country and resolve its economic crisis.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Putin’s reported tactics in Crimea are sure to backfire.

headline.main: What Is Russia’s Aim in Ukraine?
headline.print_headline: What Is Russia’s Aim in Ukraine?
